verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, in my \w prayer|strong="H7879"\w*: \w preserve|strong="H5341"\w* my \w life|strong="H2416"\w* from \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*.

\w Hide|strong="H5641"\w* me from the secret \w counsel|strong="H5475"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7489"\w*; from the \w insurrection|strong="H7285"\w* of the \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*:

Who \w whet|strong="H8150"\w* their \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* like a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \add and\add* \w bend|strong="H1869"\w* \add their bows to shoot\add* their \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*, \add even\add* \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*:

That they may \w shoot|strong="H3384"\w* in \w secret|strong="H4565"\w* at the \w perfect|strong="H8535"\w*: \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* do they \w shoot|strong="H3384"\w* at him, and \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not.

They \w encourage|strong="H2388"\w* themselves \add in\add* an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*: they \w commune|strong="H5608"\w* of \w laying|strong="H2934"\w* \w snares|strong="H4170"\w* \w privily|strong="H2934"\w*; they \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Who shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* them?\f + \fr 64.5 \ft matter: or, speech\f*\f + \fr 64.5 \ft of…: Heb. to hide his snares\f*

They search \w out|strong="H2664"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5766"\w*; they \w accomplish|strong="H8552"\w* a \w diligent|strong="H2664"\w* \w search|strong="H2665"\w*: both the \w inward|strong="H7130"\w* \add thought\add* of every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \add of them\add*, and the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \add is\add* \w deep|strong="H6013"\w*.\f + \fr 64.6 \ft they…: or, we are consumed by that which they have throughly searched\f*\f + \fr 64.6 \ft a diligent…: Heb. a search searched\f*

But \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w shoot|strong="H3384"\w* at them \add with\add* an \w arrow|strong="H2671"\w*; \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* shall they be \w wounded|strong="H4347"\w*.\f + \fr 64.7 \ft shall they…: Heb. their wound shall be\f*
So they shall make their own \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* to \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* upon themselves: all that \w see|strong="H7200"\w* them shall flee \w away|strong="H5074"\w*.

And all \w men|strong="H0120"\w* shall \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*, and shall \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* the \w work|strong="H6467"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; for they shall wisely \w consider|strong="H7919"\w* of his \w doing|strong="H4639"\w*.

The \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and shall \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in him; and all the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall \w glory|strong="H1984"\w*.
